⁵ Argentum oere solutum] Commentators are not agreed as to the precise import of these words. Some take aryentum to be put in ge- neral for debitum, and aere for aerarium .· and then the meaning would be, that the private debts of these poor people were ordered to be paid out of the public treasury. Some again take the words to import, that brass was made to pass in payment for suver, weight for weight.
